meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled or knowledgeable in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The baking meister effortlessly whipped up a batch of delicious cookies.
meanings.sent2: She became a meister in painting after years of practice and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The gardening meister could make even the most stubborn plants bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent4: He was a meister at solving complex puzzles, always finding the right piece.
meanings.sent5: The meister of woodworking carved intricate designs with precision and care.

meanings.definition: A master or expert in a specific craft or profession.
meanings.sent1: The sushi meister skillfully prepared the freshest fish for his customers.
meanings.sent2: As a meister of calligraphy, she could create stunning works of art with just a brush.
meanings.sent3: The knitting meister could knit a sweater in record time without dropping a stitch.
meanings.sent4: He was a meister of storytelling, captivating audiences with his imaginative tales.
meanings.sent5: The meister of photography captured breathtaking moments with perfect timing.
